title: Episode 18: Alex Massialas
itunes:title: Episode 18: Alex Massialas
description: Alex Massialas, silver medalist in fencing, joins Sasha this week. They talk about Alex's rich family history in fencing and how his family has changed the career trajectory of today's fencers. Alex explains the mental side of fencing and how he gets in the zone to compete. Sasha asks Alex about using his platform to fight to restore 11 sports varsity programs cut from his alma mater Stanford and speak out against Asian American hate.
author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
itunes:author: U.S. Olympic & Paralympic Committee
